price: 17. Nabii Yuusuf tooboko Nabbaw:diggah nanu ardah ittat qalalluh genneeh Yuusuf ni duyyeh xaqul cabne, tokkel suulayti kaa yokmeeh nanu wohut numma yacee mara nakkeway atu nee manummassa immay kaak iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُؤۡمِنٖ لَّنَا وَلَوۡ كُنَّا صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā innā dhahabnā nastabiqu wataraknā yūsufa ʿinda matāʿinā fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wamā anta bimu'minin lanā walaw kunnā ṣādiqīna
